div.p: Distance learning will continue through the end of the school year.

section.h1: Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â
Â Â Welcome to Brevard Academy
section.p: Â

We are a public charter school located in beautiful Transylvania County. Â We serve students from a number of Western North Carolina counties. Â We are part of TeamCFA and differentiate ourselves by offering a rigorous curriculum for students in grades K-8.

The Mission of Brevard Academy is to prepare its students to achieve academic excellence through the Core Knowledge Sequence. Â Through a partnership involving students, teachers, and parents the school strives to create citizens with strong moral character and active intellectual inquiry.

Brevard Academy: Â A Challenge Foundation Academy (BA-CFA) a K-8 public charter school develops and encourages motivated, intellectually curious students who are skilled in critical thinking, individual expression and problem solving. Â From their diverse backgrounds, students accept our challenge to pursue personal and academic excellence. Â Through this pursuit, they become confident members of their community who lead by serving others.
At BA-CFA: A Challenge Foundation Academy we believe that all children are valuable, have an innate curiosity, a willingness to learn, and that every child brings a unique gift to our school.

Ensure a safe, nurturing environment
Promote teacher/student relationships
Foster whole-child education
Be a setting that inspires high academic achievement
Embrace cultural diversity
Provide a socially, emotionally, and physically enriching environment
Encourage and support teachers to use creative teaching methods
Be a community of teachers, school director, parents, board members and
students that support and respect each other
Develop lifelong learners

Respect and value the gifts of each student
Be sensitive to the emotional and physical needs of students
Foster a love of learning and curiosity
Be committed to the success of each student
Recognize and teach to the whole child
Promote student responsibility through positive reinforcement and encouragement
Continually seek professional development

Be respectful and responsible members of the community
Believe in the potential of each person, including themselves to learn
Think globally and embrace the ideals of tolerance and fairness
Be active, positive participants in their school communities and the community as a whole
Approach and solve problems creatively and collaboratively
Be self-motivated and confident in their abilities to achieve
Value and respect themselves as well as others
We hope that you opt to learn more about Brevard Academy: A Challenge Foundation Academy.

Sincerely,
Ted Duncan
School Director
